    Authors and Citation

    Authors

    • Rodrigo Pires. Author, maintainer.

    • Anna Hepworth. Author.

    • Rebecca O'Leary. Author.

    • Jonathan Carroll. Author.

    • James Goldie. Author.

    • Dean Marchiori. Author.

    • Paul Melloy. Author.

    • Mark Padgham. Author.

    • Hugh Parsonage. Author.

    • Keith Pembleton. Author.

    • Maëlle Salmon. Contributor.
      Contributed to debugging a nasty little bug with CI where timezones caused tests to fail due to vcr not recognising the URL when run outside of Australia/Perth TZ! Suggested the use of `withr::local_timzeone()`, see <https://github.com/ropensci/weatherOz/commit/b052bf91973b8d7e147a39e8938405a64622634b>.

    • Jimmy Ng. Contributor.

    • Steve Collins. Contributor.
      Designed weatherOz's hex logo.

    • Adam H. Sparks. Author.

    • Laurens Geffert. Reviewer.

    • Sam Rogers. Reviewer.

    • Western Australia Agriculture Authority (WAAA). Copyright holder.

    Citation

    Source: DESCRIPTION

    Pires R, Hepworth A, O'Leary R, Carroll J, Goldie J, Marchiori D, Melloy P, Padgham M, Parsonage H, Pembleton K, Sparks A (2024). weatherOz: An API Client for Australian Weather and Climate Data Resources. R package version 1.0.0, https://docs.ropensci.org/weatherOz, https://github.com/ropensci/weatherOz/. 

    @Manual{,
  title = {weatherOz: An API Client for Australian Weather and Climate Data Resources},

}
